fields.name: HotCachePeriod
fields.description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

fields.name: IsFollowed
fields.description: Indicates whether the database is followed.

fields.name: KeyVaultProperties
fields.description: KeyVault properties for the database encryption.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

fields.name: SoftDeletePeriod
fields.description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

fields.name: SuspensionDetails
fields.description: The database suspension details. If the database is suspended, this object contains information related to the database's suspension state.
